Professional Pressure Washing Services

Comprehensive cleaning solutions for residential and commercial properties throughout the Niagara region.

Our Specialized Services

Each service is tailored to deliver exceptional results while protecting your property investment.

Driveway Cleaning

Professional cleaning for concrete, asphalt, and interlocking driveways. Remove years of dirt, stains, and grime.

  • Concrete driveway cleaning
  • Asphalt surface restoration
  • Interlocking brick cleaning
  • Stain and discoloration removal
  • Sealing services available

House Washing

Gentle yet effective exterior house cleaning that protects your home while delivering outstanding results.

  • Soft wash technique
  • All siding materials
  • Window and trim cleaning
  • Mold and mildew removal
  • Eco-friendly solutions

Deck Cleaning

Restore your deck to its original beauty with our specialized wood and composite deck cleaning services.

  • Wood deck restoration
  • Composite deck cleaning
  • Stain and seal preparation
  • Mold and algae removal
  • Gentle cleaning process

Oil Stain Removal

Specialized treatment for stubborn oil, grease, and automotive fluid stains on driveways and garage floors.

  • Heavy-duty degreasing
  • Hot water treatment
  • Specialized cleaning agents
  • Concrete restoration
  • Preventive treatments

Siding Cleaning

Safe and effective cleaning for all types of siding materials, from vinyl to wood to composite.

  • Vinyl siding cleaning
  • Wood siding restoration
  • Composite material care
  • Algae and mold removal
  • Color restoration

Roof Cleaning

Professional roof cleaning to remove moss, algae, and debris while protecting your roofing materials.

  • Soft wash roof cleaning
  • Moss and algae removal
  • Gutter cleaning included
  • Shingle protection
  • Preventive treatments
